snippet: For the 41st game in a row, Kevin Durant scored at least 25 points. Not even Michael Jordan ever did that....

headline.print_headline: Durant Scores 38 but Suns Beat Thunder 122-115
headline.main: Durant Scores 38 but Suns Beat Thunder 122-115

lead_paragraph: For the 41st game in a row, Kevin Durant scored at least 25 points. Not even Michael Jordan ever did that.
